docs.snippet: The City Authorities of Washington yesterday took formal leave of the outgoing President, and paid their respects to the incoming one. Mr. LINCOLN, in his reply to the address of the Mayor, took occasion to say that he thought much of the bad feeling...
docs.lead_paragraph: The City Authorities of Washington yesterday took formal leave of the outgoing President, and paid their respects to the incoming one. Mr. LINCOLN, in his reply to the address of the Mayor, took occasion to say that he thought much of the bad feeling which existed between the two seetions of the country grew out of misunderstanding,...

docs.snippet: The Court, assembled to try Commander WALKE, of the storeship Supply, resumed its sittings at the Lyceum of the Brooklyn Navy-yard, at 10 o'clock yesterday morning.

headline.main: The Naval General Court-Martial.; CASE OF CAPT. WALKE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Court, assembled to try Commander WALKE, of the storeship Supply, resumed its sittings at the Lyceum of the Brooklyn Navy-yard, at 10 o'clock yesterday morning.

headline.main: Power of the Health Commissioners May their Proceedings be Reviewed?; SUPREME COURT GENERAL TERM Before Justices Clerke, Sutherland and Allen

docs.snippet: A COMMENDABLE CHARITY. By advertisement published in another column, it will be seen that the Board of Managers of the Nursery and Child's Hospital hold their annual meeting next Friday forenoon, at the Institution, situated on Fifty-first-street,...
docs.lead_paragraph: A COMMENDABLE CHARITY. By advertisement published in another column, it will be seen that the Board of Managers of the Nursery and Child's Hospital hold their annual meeting next Friday forenoon, at the Institution, situated on Fifty-first-street, near Third-avenue. All friends of the objects for which the charity has been founded, are requested to attend.

docs.snippet: The City was startled on Saturday by the intelligence, contained in an extra edition of the TIMES, that the President elect, instead of proceeding on his journey to Washington from Harrisburgh, in accordance with the published programme, on Saturday...
docs.lead_paragraph: The City was startled on Saturday by the intelligence, contained in an extra edition of the TIMES, that the President elect, instead of proceeding on his journey to Washington from Harrisburgh, in accordance with the published programme, on Saturday morning, had left the latter city secretly, on...

headline.main: The Chief Justice of the Superior Court Gose South for his Health.

PRESENT CONDITION OF MEDICAL SCIENCE.; "DISEASE' IS CURED BY NATURAL PROCESSES ALONE, TO PROMOTE WHICH VITAL POWER MUST BE UPHELD; AND REMEDIES IN ANY FOR CAN ONLY BE USEFUL SO FAR AS THEY EXCITE, ASSIST OR PROMOTE THESE NATURAL CURATIVE PROCESSES."

docs.snippet: A SCHEMS OF GENERAL EMANCIPATION. Somebody, stimulated by Lord BROUGHAM'S letter to the Boston John Brown Committee, sends the Ex-Chancellor a report of a conversation with the late Dr. CHALMERS, in which that learned and eloquent divine detailed his...
docs.lead_paragraph: A SCHEMS OF GENERAL EMANCIPATION. Somebody, stimulated by Lord BROUGHAM'S letter to the Boston John Brown Committee, sends the Ex-Chancellor a report of a conversation with the late Dr. CHALMERS, in which that learned and eloquent divine detailed his plan for abolishing Slavery.
